titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain PCBTF with an acid acceptor.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain PCBTF with an acid acceptor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of certain PCBTF with an acid acceptor, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such article.
